content.description: The mean age of the employees at a large corporation is 35.2 years, and the standard deviation is 9.5 years. A random sample of 4 employees will be selected.
content.question: What are the mean and standard deviation of the sampling distribution of the sample mean for samples of size 4 ?

choices.label: The mean is 35.2, and the standard deviation is 9.5.

The mean is 35.2, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the fraction 9.5 over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is 35.2, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the fraction 9.5 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is <math alttext="the fraction 35.2 over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>35.2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the fraction 9.5 over 4" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

The mean is <math alttext="the fraction 35.2 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>35.2</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the fraction 9.5 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

content.answer: The mean is 35.2, and the standard deviation is <math alttext="the fraction 9.5 over 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>9.5</mn></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Determine parameters for probability distributions.
